summary: Validate Todo.from_dict() 'done' field accepts only bool or 0/1
acceptance_criteria_met: Loading JSON with done=2, done=-1, done='false' raises ValueError
Loading JSON with done=true/false, done=1/0 continues to work
Test case added for invalid done field values
risks: Breaking change for JSON files with non-0/1 integer 'done' values
Could reject data from previous versions if they had truthy int values
